title: Print, "Getty Center, Los Angeles: Getty III Museum, for American Academy of Arts and Letters Centennial Portfolio", spring 1998
title_raw: Getty Center, Los Angeles: Getty III Museum, for American Academy of Arts and Letters Centennial Portfolio
signed: Signed in graphite at lower right:  Richard Meier
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right:  AP 7/15 Richard Meier 1998
description: Plan in reddish brown (check color against print) of Getty Museum at left and ground portion of the Center for the History of Art and Humanities at lower right on graph-paper-like ground.  Superimposed on buildings is a geometric overlay which establishes relationship of building masses.  Garden areas (designed by Robert Irwin) around buildings are indicated by crude brush strokes in gray and gold.

tombstone.epitaph: Print, "Getty Center, Los Angeles: Getty III Museum, for American Academy of Arts and Letters Centennial Portfolio", spring 1998. Lithograph on paper. Gift of Richard Meier. 1999-33-12.
